name: Cake Defender 2 (Factory Defender)
description:
Story: After George received the cake from Phil, he ate some of it -- the cake helps George stay focused on his work. George is an inventor; he is currently working on his latest invention in his factory, and he spends a lot of time on it. Because of that, his other inventions get jealous. So they try to destroy the latest invention. Now, it is up to George to protect it. Will you be able to help George with that?

Music used:

Nervous by Kevin MacLeod

Link: https://incompetech.filmmusic.io/song/4118-nervous

License: https://filmmusic.io/standard-license
